quest.name: Meat and Greet
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol faces an unprecedented dilemma: a disastrous deluge of dead deer delicacies.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid rock salt in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid rock salt to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid tree bark in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid tree bark to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid Night's bass in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid Night's bass to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Our Viis friends have presented us with an enormous haul of venison as a sign of their appreciation for our work. The only problem is, there's so much of it, we'll need to smoke the meat before it goes rotten!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some rock salt? Sprinkling it on the meat beforehand draws out the rich, gamey flavors!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some tree bark? Naturally, only the most splendid will suffice.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to spear me a Night's bass? It may not be the most obvious choice, but apparently, smoking it together with the deer meat helps to preserve it.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If I could tear myself away from my duties here, and I had even the slightest inkling of how spearfishing works, I'd probably try my luck at Lake Tusi Mek'ta.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Have you brought that which I requested? Time is of the essence!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My word, this is splendid! Just the fragrance alone makes me want to gobble it all up, even without the venison...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, of course, that would rather defeat the purpose of having you rush around before the meat spoils. And we wouldn't want the Viis' generous gift to go to waste, now, would we?
